thread.title: Manju's Vettah kicks off!
thread.title_full: Manju's Vettah kicks off! - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: Manju's Vettah kicks off!
text:
Women centric films have been the in-thing in Malayalam film industry for the last few years.
Manju Warrier has been one of the forerunners in portraying liberating roles through films such as How Old are You? and Ennum Eppozhum. Apparently, the powerful roles that she dons in movies Vettah and Rani Padmini will also be strong woman characters . With her next film Vettah , Manju dons khaki as city Police Commissioner Sreebala IPS, and the shoot of the film has just started rolling.
The film, directed by Rajesh Pillai, has Indrajith and Kunchacko Boban playing prominent roles. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
